It prospective , single blind , randomize clinical trial perform Center Research course Speech Therapy , Physical Therapy Occupational Therapy São Paulo University . Thirty-two older adult randomly control experimental group , 16 one . Both group perform 14 training session , twice week , seven week . Each session compose 30 minute-global-exercise series include stretch , muscle strength axial mobility exercise . After , group perform 30 minute balance training : control group perform balance exercise without external cue , visual auditory feedback cognitive stimulation ; experimental group perform balance training 10 Wii Fit game stimulate motor cognitive function . The main outcome measure : ( 1 ) Mini-BESTest Dynamic Balance Evaluation ; ( 2 ) Dynamic Gait Index ( DGI ) ; ( 3 ) Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) ; ( 4 ) Falls Efficacy Scale - International ( FES-I ) .
